field.name: description
field.value: This is the default email template used for generating notifications on project assignment.

field.name: content
field.value:
<#assign lang=notifications.getUserLanguage(user)> <#assign role=utils.getUserRole(target, user)> Hello, ${user.properties['firstName']},
you have been assigned as a member to project: <#if target.properties['identifier']??>${target.properties['identifier']}, ${codelists.getCodeValue(2, target.properties['type']).properties[lang]}
Your role in the project will be <#if role == 'MANAGER'> Project Manager<#elseif role == 'COLLABORATOR'> Collaborator<#elseif role == 'CONTRIBUTOR'> Contributor<#elseif role == 'CONSUMER'> Consumer,
To view project details click the link below:
${target.properties['title']}
Regards,
Administrator
